T=int(raw_input())
while T:
    T-=1
    N=int(raw_input())
    lol=dict()
    x=raw_input().split()
    for i in range(N):
        
        lol[int(x[i])]=lol.get(int(x[i]),0)+1
    array=sorted([(b,a) for (a,b) in lol.items()])
    array.reverse()
    count=array[0][0]
    value=array[0][1]
    for i in range(1,len(array)):
        if(array[i][0]==count):
            value=array[i][1]
        else:
            break
    print value,count
